Synopsis: Provides a way to configure Required Modules or External Modules that will be used in the project.
Description: Provides a way to configure Required Modules or External Modules that will be used in the project.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Markdown: Add standard module dependencies (directly, but can be used with loop as well)
Examples.Code:
New-ConfigurationModule -Type RequiredModule -Name 'platyPS' -Guid 'Auto' -Version 'Latest'
New-ConfigurationModule -Type RequiredModule -Name 'powershellget' -Guid 'Auto' -Version 'Latest'
New-ConfigurationModule -Type RequiredModule -Name 'PSScriptAnalyzer' -Guid 'Auto' -Version 'Latest'

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Markdown: Add external module dependencies, using loop for simplicity

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Markdown:
Add approved modules, that can be used as a dependency, but only when specific function from those modules is used
And on that time only that function and dependant functions will be copied over
Keep in mind it has it's limits when "copying" functions such as it should not depend on DLLs or other external files
